statements: SELECT * FROM textbooks WHERE author = 'John Smith';
SELECT title, author FROM textbooks WHERE publication_year > 2010;
SELECT title, publication_year FROM textbooks WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY publication_year DESC;
SELECT author, quantity FROM textbooks WHERE author LIKE '%Brown%' ORDER BY author ASC;
SELECT textbook_id, title FROM textbooks WHERE publication_year BETWEEN 2000 AND 2020;
SELECT * FROM textbooks WHERE quantity > 0 ORDER BY publication_year DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT title, author FROM textbooks WHERE author LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY title ASC;
SELECT title, publication_year FROM textbooks ORDER BY quantity DESC, publication_year ASC;
SELECT author, COUNT(*) AS total_books FROM textbooks GROUP BY author HAVING COUNT(*) > 2 ORDER BY total_books DESC;
SELECT * FROM textbooks WHERE author IS NULL OR publication_year < 2000 ORDER BY textbook_id;
SELECT * FROM textbooks WHERE id = 1;
SELECT title, author FROM textbooks WHERE id = 2;
SELECT author, inventory FROM textbooks WHERE title LIKE '%Science%';
SELECT * FROM technology_equipment WHERE condition = 'New' ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT device_name, quantity FROM technology_equipment WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT title, author FROM textbooks WHERE inventory > 0 ORDER BY title ASC;
SELECT * FROM textbooks WHERE author LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT device_name, quantity, condition FROM technology_equipment WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT title, author, inventory FROM textbooks WHERE title LIKE '%Science%' AND author = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM textbooks JOIN technology_equipment ON textbooks.id = technology_equipment.id WHERE textbooks.inventory > technology_equipment.quantity ORDER BY textbooks.title ASC;
SELECT * FROM textbooks;
SELECT title, author FROM textbooks WHERE quantity > 5;
SELECT id, category FROM textbooks ORDER BY category DESC;
SELECT * FROM technology_equipment WHERE condition = 'good';
SELECT * FROM administrators WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT * FROM textbooks WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY title ASC;
SELECT id, title, author FROM textbooks WHERE category = 'Mathematics' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM administrators WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT * FROM technology_equipment WHERE quantity <= 5 AND condition = 'New' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT id, type, quantity FROM technology_equipment WHERE type = 'Laptop' OR type = 'Tablet' ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM textbooks ORDER BY title ASC;
SELECT author, title, quantity FROM textbooks WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT id, device_name, quantity FROM technology_equipment WHERE quantity < 5 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM administrators WHERE name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT log_id, item_id, timestamp FROM inventory_logs WHERE action = 'added' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, title, author, quantity FROM textbooks WHERE quantity > 0 ORDER BY author ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT device_name, model, quantity FROM technology_equipment WHERE quantity < 10 ORDER BY quantity DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT name, email FROM administrators WHERE id BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
SELECT * FROM inventory_logs WHERE action = 'purchased' AND timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT item_type, COUNT(*) as total_count FROM inventory_logs GROUP BY item_type HAVING total_count > 1 ORDER BY total_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM textbooks;
SELECT title, author, quantity FROM textbooks ORDER BY author DESC;
SELECT id, price FROM textbooks WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT * FROM administrators WHERE role = 'Manager';
SELECT name, email, phone FROM administrators WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT * FROM textbooks ORDER BY title DESC, price ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT author, COUNT(*) as book_count FROM textbooks GROUP BY author HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY book_count DESC;
SELECT title, author, price FROM textbooks WHERE quantity > 0 AND price BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM administrators WHERE role = 'Manager' OR role = 'Supervisor' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT item_id, item_name, transaction_date FROM inventory_logs WHERE action = 'SOLD' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 5;
